title: Citrus Garlic Chicken Saute
directions: Boil fettuccine and Dice up the onion and chicken breasts.
Heat a skillet on high with olive oil. Add the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Cook for two minutes and turn heat down to medium when you flip to other side.
Add onions to skillet and cook for several minutes.
Add garlic, a portion of the parsley, and the red pepper flakes.
Add lemon juice, butter, and cooked fettuccine (drained) to skillet.
Season again with salt and pepper.
Serve with Parmesan and parsley sprinkled on top.
